Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
At a distance, far away, remote, alien. Feminine accusative case singular of makros; at a distance.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Near. From a primary verb agcho; near.
